title: Black Sabbath - 13 (BrickwallHater Remaster)
description:
DMCA was getting on my nerves on Kickass, so i'm reuploading my torrents from there on here...so they never get removed.

Well, I always had lots of difficulty when trying to remaster this awesome album; SO MANY TIMES!
Until today, that is....    I tried my luck with some of my newly made custom Perfect Declipper VST presets,
and I got AMAZING RESULTS!!!  It went straight from DR5 to a DR12 after restoration was complete, which is 
quite excellent if you ask me.This just goes to show that Rick Rubin really should screw off, and stop producing(RUINING) more albums,
cause all he does is make them LOUD and DISTORTED!!! But at least this isn't the worst sounding record
in his production catalog. Death Magnetic by Metallica, on the other hand, YES, is the worst sounding album of
all Rubin's productions! But hey, what you're all going to hear with this new remaster, is more punch, clarity,
far less "wall of sound", and most of all, NO MORE CLIPPING!!!! :D

Enjoy the new "13" folks!

All the best, BrickwallHater
